insert into government_info (parent_id, names, level, logo_url, administrative_division_area_code, address, address_x, address_y, hourse_numbers, principle_name, principle_contact, create_time, update_time, is_delete, status, manager_name, manager_phone, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, county_id, county_name, street_id, street_name, community_id, community_name, account, password ) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativeDivisionAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hourseNumbers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principleContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update government_info set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, names = #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_url = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, administrative_division_area_code = #{administrativeDivisionAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_x = #{addressX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_y = #{addressY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hourse_numbers = #{hourseNumbers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principle_name = #{principleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principle_contact = #{principleContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_phone = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_name = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street_id = #{streetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street_name = #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_name = #{communityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, names, level, logo_url, administrative_division_area_code, address, address_x, address_y, hourse_numbers, principle_name, principle_contact, create_time, update_time, is_delete, status, manager_name, manager_phone, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, county_id, county_name, street_id, street_name, community_id, community_name, account, password from government_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
